TopicTitle: How come My buildings say they are fully upgraded, when clearly they are not?

Articles.Content:
Though it shows "Fully upgraded" and that my Launch platform can hold unlimited weight, but in the tower that you build your ship in it shows that it holds a max 18 tons.

My mission building is the same, says that i can hold unlimited contracts when i can only hold two at a time.

I am clueless as to why this is. please help.

Hi lordmasta, you're playing the 64bit version, and career is broken.

You'll have to play career using the normal KSP.exe, and only use KSP\_64.exe for sandbox.
